post.body: RE: Yanik's "freebie"...I got the formula...Freebie = Course Launch + Continuity Program. It is the trend right now in IM.
saw your "learning, learning, learning" twitt. Make sure you've got about 2x as many "implementing" in there to see results.
Excellent work on the squidoo lens. That a way to take action for your business!
Nothing will ever be as cool as the watch calculator man! :-)
Awesome, glad you liked it. :-) Have a Merry Christmas!
Yeah, my kids LOVE that I fill a 5-gallon change container since I allow them to get dibs on it.
I do agree with you...there are a lot of BAD videos out there that is merely a pitch for their business with a lot of promises.
LOL...that is scary.
Classic quote and good focus reminder.
nice list.
Ahhh...but if a person shortens the videos and bring the steak each time they will take their business to the next level.
That "Snuggie" commercial makes me laugh every time I see it on TV!
"Quality" is always better than shear "Quantity"...but if you can bring quantity in line with quality you're set.
Use Windows Movie Maker, it's FREE and gets the job done.
Writing down 3 tasks I've put off and will finish them TODAY! And THIS is the secret to success...just say NO to procrastination. :-)
Rocking out to this http://snipurl.com/sf-meanttolive while re-writing the YBS Formula. We were meant to live for SO MUCH MORE!!!
Just finished some lunch and now starting a couple targeted marketing campaigns.
Building a marketing funnel is EASY when you get the how to...and I give people the how to so THEY are empowered for a lifetime.
Why buy "systems" at $47/mo or $149/mo to brand the "systems" owner and build the "system" owners downline?
If you use Firefox, here's a cool tool to synch your bookmarks. http://www.FoxMarks.com
Here's a great tip that is often ignored...make sure most of your time is spent implementing each day.
Just finished a strategy session call...make sure you have testing & analytics set up in your marketing funnel...test & track to improve!
Helping people build POWERFUL marketing funnels for their You Inc.
Fall is here and it's a great time to build a home business. The $1-million question is, are prospects CALLING YOU to join your business?
Enjoying the rain...we need it!
My phone is ringing off the hook...people are looking for answers...and I'm giving them solutions to their problems.
I just finished a call to begin a JV with a fellow Top Income Earner. Are you networking (in lieu of pitching a biz) with others to succeed?
...feel free to swipe the lock! http://snipurl.com/lockitup And get my FREE eBook for more value to get your biz into the BIG LEAGUES!!!
...below my button...INCREASED conversions by 4.3%! Go see my squeeze page and...
Heading out for lunch at the Country Club then work on the golf game. Here's a conversion tip, I added a lock to my privacy statement...
So many "courses" out about productivity...is it unproductive to check email while watching your daily leads climb to 20+ by 11am? LOL!
Hello Tweeters, check out this AWESOME video and re-tweet! http://tinyurl.com/5usjlc
Here's another layer of defense for blog spam beyond Askimet. http://tinyurl.com/39m2y5
Just got done watching the movie Hitch with my beautiful bride. This clip is funny. http://tinyurl.com/75jak3
What a crazy day today...lots of phone calls coming in and I had some good conversations with great people.
Is being green your thing? I found a cool little site that you will like. http://www.SwitchPlanet.com ReTweet if you like.
Listening to the kids and wife in the background baking away for the holidays while I play (aka work). :-)
Just finished a good night of catching up with friends and getting stuffed.
What would you prefer? 1) The knowledge to create your OWN marketing funnel you own and customize? 2) Pay $47/month for a "system" to use.
Nothin' like hot oatmeal to get the day started eh?
I'm lovin' this mind mapping tool...great for product creation brainstorming & organizing. http://www.mindmeister.com
Have you caught the buzz? This is the secret weapon for internet marketing...get the buzz. http://snipurl.com/getthebuzz
